item.title: MLOps with SageMaker â€” Part I
item.description: How to effortlessly train sklearn ðŸ“Š, pytorchðŸ”¥, and transformers ðŸ¤— models in the cloud SageMaker is a Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) platform, offered by AWS, that provides a number of tools for developing machine learning models from no code solutions to completely custom. With SageMaker, you can label data, train your own models in the cloud using hyperparameter optimization, and then deploy those models easily behind a cloud hosted API. In this series of posts we will explore SageMakerâ€™s services and provide guides on how to use them, along with code examples.
